title: A Qi Aoyou Ji
synopsis:
On Chicken Island, there lives an assassin named Wu Liuqi. Through a series of coincidences, Wu Liuqi is forced to travel to various parallel universes to carry out missions. However, during these missions, he gradually discovers that a mysterious force is slowly threatening Chicken Island. Therefore, he decides to uncover the mastermind and protect Chicken Island!

(Source: Bangumi, translated)
